ModMetaData.name: MorrowRim - Simple Bonemold
ModMetaData.author: SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
A simple mod that just adds in craftable bonemold, as in the resource item, not armour. Also includes craftable bonemold blocks, and an assortment of bonemold floors.

-Requires either Rim of Madness Bones or Medieval Overhaul, otherwise you can't craft it.

-Supports Vanilla Achievements Expanded.
-Based on the 'Elder Scrolls' series by Bethesda Game Studios
-Preview image template by Theyn_T.
